Texts.Chs: 这处中央回路终端的数据库里面有一本^orange;c雏机工艺指南^white;的拷贝，但我现在还不能访问。在我下载文件之前，终端需要一些升级。^green;我应该收集^orange;10条内存^green;并返回任何中央回路终端^white;进行升级。
Texts.Eng: This Central Circuit Terminal has a copy of a ^orange;Trinkian Crafting Guide ^white;in its database, but I can't access it yet. The terminal needs a few upgrades before I can download the file. ^green;I should gather ^orange;10 Sticks of RAM ^green;and return to any Central Circuit Terminal ^white;to start the upgrade.

Texts.Chs: 升级完成后，我现在需要做的就是下载文件。
Texts.Eng: With the upgrade completed, all I need to do now is download the file.
